Package hospital.staff

Class Appointment

java.lang.Object
hospital.staff.Appointment
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Appointment>
public class Appointment
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Appointment>, java.io.Serializable
This class represents an appointment in one or more professional's electronic diary. Stores and sets data about the appointment.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo​(Appointment o)
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Appointment>
      Parameters:
      o - The other appointment to compare this appointment to
      Returns:
      0 if the two appointment start at the same time, a negative number if the argument starts later then this appointment, a positive number if the argument starts sooner then this appointment
